post.body: Lucky girl. RU having Thai lettuce wraps?
Agreed!
Great to meet you in person at #ce08.
I got an e-mail today from a student in the UK...looking for perspective on "what are the barriers for librarians using 2.0?"
Can anyone attend an unconference?
I'm with ya. Can't tell U how many times I have typed an e-mail & hit Enter thinking it would go. Oh yeah...Send.
Change is incremental. At least that is what they keep telling me.
The tie. Definitely. With a black shirt. Sharp!
Wrapping last of the presents 2day. Ingredients for cookies laid out on the counter. Baking is next. The house is going to smell yummy!
Yep, Mom finally caved. Santa will be bringing a cell phone for 12-year old DD.
Grateful to have made it to work safely today. My thoughts are with those traveling for the holiday this year.
#ce08. Users are talking. Does the library hear what they are saying?
Just dropped in on #ce08. Great convo. Love hearing users tell the library where they want us to find them and where they want to find us.
Just got here at 3:30 today. I'm 90 e-mails behind and have a 3 hour phone shift. Not complaning, just rolling with the punches...
Back from holiday gathering at OHIONET where I did my practicum project. Those people know how to party!
Egregious sins of social networking. RU guilty? http://tinyurl.com/5tuf4s
Strangest Christmas song duet combination = Cyndi Lauper and Frank Sinatra. How did that happen?
Been working on my IM project and not checking my feeds. Right now my Bloglines says I have 204 unread items. Jeesh!
Calling all Twitter addicts. 19 Twitter tools just 4 you. http://tinyurl.com/5sow7n
First staff training session for IM service completed. A few bumps, but nothing major. =)
